data.name: TYRONE vs COPS: Golden Blicky
data.detailed_description:
Ayo, you finna be laughed off the streets with that basic ass blicky... Getchu some gold, King.

Replaces your boring black blicky with an expensive and boujee GOLDEN BLICKY.

Purely cosmetic. An absolute waste of money. Buy it. Tyrone would.
